1.0.name: wordpress/wp-theme-file-uploader
1.0.description: Upload files directly to your active wordpress theme. With this plugin you can add template files, css files, images, any assets needed to add to you active wordpress theme. Add jpg, png, .php, .js, .css, .html files to you active theme with out ftp or upload program.
